about.title: Grow your revenue through Web3 Experience
about.subtitle: I
about.description: Games & Web3 entrepreneur. Consultant. Revenue share advocate.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: more 5 years
info: I have more than 5 years of experience in the space of Web3, video games monetization, and software engineering.
I worked on various products including crypto payments for games, miner for players, game investment paltform and web3 protocol for revenue share management
Now I'm a development leader at 3thix, which is a wallet by gamers for gamers.
I take part in gaming-related events like Gamescom and GDC as well as blockchain-related events.

losung.title: Letâ€™s build toghether
losung.description: We will get through your business together and I will build a web3 strategy for you

process.title: Honest workflow and pricing. Pay for results.
info: In our world, we all want to acheive impressive results. You pay for solving problems and my experience. I am huge fan of revenue share and pay for perfomance model. If you get insane results, I want to get a portion of it. It is a win-win strategy.
I'm extremly motivated and have a skin in the game in your project because my compansation depends on project's success.
If you are now sure, we can start with regular paid consultation and when you are ready, we can discuss changing the model.
